summary: I'm going through the comments of that non-apology apology Tweet the Cyberpunk 2077 Twitter account made and blocking anyone...
body:
I’m going through the comments of that non-apology apology Tweet the Cyberpunk 2077 Twitter account made and blocking anyone I’ve seen using the words “snowflake,” “triggered,” “SJWs”, etc. for no particular reason because I rarely use my Twitter account.

I’ve noticed that anyone I’ve blocked whose avatar wasn’t some anime shit or a bad meme was a white dude, go figure.

Anyway, gamers are a bunch of moldy fucknuggets.

I’ve noticed that anyone I’ve blocked whose avatar wasn’t some anime shit or a bad meme was a white dude, go figure.

Anyway, gamers are a bunch of moldy fucknuggets.

Anyway, gamers are a bunch of moldy fucknuggets.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 is meant to be a FPS right? Which means we won't be able to see our characters, their outfits, gestures,...
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 is meant to be a FPS right? Which means we won’t be able to see our characters, their outfits, gestures, movement, various types of interactions with the enviroment around them (apart from what we’ll see in the cutscenes)

What’s the point of an open world then???? :)))) but keeping cd projekt red’s masterpiece The Witcher in mind, I hope they make us for this somehow.

FPS ruins a good game tho. Please don’t drop a COD on us

reblog.comment:

summary: El diseño de misiones de Cyberpunk 2077 se asemeja a las expansiones de The Witcher 3
title: El diseño de misiones de Cyberpunk 2077 se asemeja a las expansiones de The Witcher 3
body:
El diseño de misiones de Cyberpunk 2077 se asemeja a las expansiones de The Witcher 3

El diseñador de misiones de CD Projekt Red, Patrick Mills, ha comparado las misiones en Cyberpunk 2077 con las expansiones de The Witcher 3, diciendo que ambas son similares “en términos de tiempo de juego y… complejidad”, en una entrevista en Gamescom con PC Gamer.

“Tienes un donante de misiones, tienes a una persona por aquí, pero podrías ir directamente a esa segunda persona y tomar la misión…

View On WordPress

summary: In 2077, cyberware has become as commonplace as tattoos and jewelry. The reasons for installing it are many and varied,...
caption: In 2077, cyberware has become as commonplace as tattoos and jewelry. The reasons for installing it are many and varied, including simple tech upgrades, combat enhancements, and even fashion statements. The possession of trendy cyberware has become an integral and defining part of Night City culture. Uniqueness is just another form of currency. To make it big, you need to look the part. Style is everything.

reblog.comment: In 2077, cyberware has become as commonplace as tattoos and jewelry. The reasons for installing it are many and varied, including simple tech upgrades, combat enhancements, and even fashion statements. Style is everything.

Style is everything.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 в чем отличие между показаными демо на Е3 и Gamescom 2018
title: Cyberpunk 2077 в чем отличие между показаными демо на Е3 и Gamescom 2018
body: На прошедшей в июне выставке Е3 2018 разработчики из студии CD Projekt RED представили миру первый трейлер грядущего экшена Cyberpunk 2077. Кроме того, за закрытыми дверями состоялся показ почти часовой демонстрационной версии. Оценить новинку смогли… Читать дальше »

summary: The Cyberpunk 2077 setting is so not up my alley...I mean I'm probably gonna buy it bc it's CDPR and I trust them and I'll fall...
body: The Cyberpunk 2077 setting is so not up my alley…I mean I’m probably gonna buy it bc it’s CDPR and I trust them and I’ll fall in love with it once I start playing BUT I don’t think they could release any footage or screenshots that would get me hyped in the slightest. I’ll always just be like “Oh there’s this weird neon-colored game I’m gonna buy anyway”

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 Tweets, Apologizes for, Transphobic Joke
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Tweets, Apologizes for, Transphobic Joke
body:
#Cyberpunk2077 Tweets, Apologizes for, Transphobic Joke

The official Twitter account for CD Projekt Red’s upcoming game Cyberpunk 2077 attracted controversy yesterday. A now-deleted Tweet sent out two days ago made a joke that is generally considered transphobic. (more…)

View On WordPress
